Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:4#2041#eldritch reavers} are killing morale around here. Too many casualties, and they...they taunt us about every soldier they kill.

Slaughter them, . Give us something to taunt them about for a change.

Most impressive, .

Not only have you weakened the enemy, but our soldiers are already composing new insults based on the reavers' inability to defend themselves against a lone .

I'd tell you the insults, but wow...filthy, filthy stuff.
